query.description: 레시피명이 존재하면 fsr_recipe_cd_ref에 인서트 없이 표준레시피로 확정처리
query.statement: SELECT A.RECIPE_CD, A.RECIPE_NAME, A.RECIPE_CLASS, B.RECIPE_SEQ FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST A, ( SELECT #RECIPE_CLASS#||RECIPE_SEQ RECIPE_CD, RECIPE_NAME, RECIPE_SEQ FROM ( SELECT RECIPE_SEQ, RECIPE_NAME FROM FSR_RECIPE_CD_REF WHERE RECIPE_NAME =#RECIPE_NAME# ) ) B WHERE A.RECIPE_NAME=B.RECIPE_NAME
